nodes.text: The "Teklos" Mobile Command Base was originally designed as a commercial repulsorlift version of Nen-Carvon's PX-4 Mobile Command Base. It was intended to serve as protection for corporate officials and high-ranking civilians. Because of its combination of firepower, protection, and comfort, it quickly became favored by crime lords across the the galaxy. It was first adapted on the planet Teklos to combat swoop gangs.
